title: Positioning workspace: Add basic version history persistence for positioning recommendations

sections.text: Implement backend persistence for Positioning workspace outputs so each generated positioning recommendation can be saved as a versioned snapshot tied to workspace + segment (and comparison segment when applicable). Store metadata needed for history (created_at, created_by, segments, model/run id) and retain the full recommendation payload for later retrieval. Expose an API to list versions and fetch a specific version, with sensible limits/ordering (most recent first).
